articles.title: Create Oracle AI Autonomous Database in 1 minute
articles.description: Autonomous AI Database for Developers are low-cost, fixed shape databases intended for development and testing uses cases, and are not recommended for production use cases. When you need more compute or storage resources or you want to take advantage of additional Autonomous AI Database features, you can upgrade your Autonomous AI Database for Developers instance to a full paid service instance.

articles.title: Innovate with Oracle Generative AI & Oracle Database 23ai using MCP
articles.description: In this article, we'll explore the innovative world of Model Context Protocol (MCP) and its seamless integration with Oracle Database 23ai. We'll dive into the exciting possibilities of leveraging MCP to streamline development workflows, enhance productivity, and unlock new insights from your data.
